text.content:
Weapon Tangle

You can't use this weapon to attack until the end of your next turn.

Melee

Amazing Miss

You are @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Stunned]{Stunned 1}.

Ranged

Bone Bruise

You become @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Wounded]{Wounded 1} or your wounded value increases by 1.

Unarmed

You made 'em Bigger

The target increases in size, with the effects of a 2nd level @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Enlarge]{Enlarge} spell. @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spell-effects.Spell Effect: Enlarge]{Spell Effect: Enlarge}

Spell
